question:
Consider the following statements about Chandra Gupta-II:
  1. Kalidas was one of the nine gems of his court
  2. The famous Chinese traveller Fahien visited India during his reign
  3. He made Ujjain as his second capital
  4. Chandragupta II adopted the title Vikramaditya after defeating the Sakas
   Which of the above statements are correct?
explanation:
All given statements are correct
Chandragupta II adopted the title Vikramaditya after defeating the Sakas. He made Ujjain as his second capital. The famous Chinese traveller Fahien visited India during his reign. Kalidas was a famous poet in his court.
